Package com.emse.spring.faircorp.api

Class RoomController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emse.spring.faircorp.api.RoomController
  • @RestController
@CrossOrigin
@RequestMapping("/api/rooms")
public class RoomController
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a REST controller for the room with Spring. It can get the rooms list, add a room, get a single room, delete a room, switch the heater status or room status .

                                                     java.lang.Long room_id)

        room_id - the id of the room you want to get.

public void delete​(@PathVariable
                   java.lang.Long room_id)
        A REST request to Delete the room by id.

        room_id - the id of the room you want to get.

      • switchWindows

        @PutMapping(path="/{room_id}/switchWindow")
public void switchWindows​(@PathVariable
                          java.lang.Long room_id)
        A REST request to update the window status (OPEN/CLOSED).
        Parameters:
        room_id - the id of the room you want to change its windows.

      • switchHeaters

        @PutMapping(path="/{room_id}/switchHeaters")
public void switchHeaters​(@PathVariable
                          java.lang.Long room_id)
        A REST request to Update the heater status (ON/OFF).
        Parameters:
        room_id - the id of the room you want to change its heaters.

      • create

        @PostMapping
public com.emse.spring.faircorp.dto.RoomDto create​(@RequestBody
                                                   com.emse.spring.faircorp.dto.RoomDto roomdto)
        A REST request to Create (POST) a room.
        Parameters:
        roomdto - a room with a constructor (id, name, floor, currentTemp, targetTemp, buildingId).
        Returns:
        RoomDto A class that its constructor contains infos about the room.
